alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Hughes; Stanley; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:30PM MDT until August 01 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sully County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Stanley County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Dewey County in north central South Dakota... Northwestern Hughes County in central South Dakota... * Until 615 PM CDT/515 PM MDT/. * At 530 PM CDT/430 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chantier Creek Recreation Area, or 17 miles northwest of Fort Pierre, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Oahe Mission Rec Area around 540 PM CDT. Spring Creek Rec Area, Okobojo Point Rec Area and Cow Creek Rec Area around 550 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bush`s Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
